Room.Name: Nissiau Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nissiau Lane, between a tapestry shop and a cutlery.
Room.LongDescription: Yolanda's Intricate Weavings and Tapestries on the north side of the road provides a number of fancy carpets and other fine weavings for sale. Some are even said to be enchanted. On the south side of the road is the Knives 'R Us Cutlery, where various knives and blades may be purchased for just about any usage.
